name: Jinkyu Jeong
content: S3@YONSEI - ProfessorSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationProfessorJinkyu Jeong (정진규)Associate ProfessorDepartment of Computer ScienceDepartment of Artifical IntelligenceYonsei UniversityBiographical SketchI am an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science at Yonsei University. Before joining Yonsei University, I was an assistant and associate professor in the Department of Semi-conductor Systems Engineering at Sungkyunkwan University. I received my Ph.D. degree in computer science from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (Advisor: Joonwon Lee) and my B.S. degree from Yonsei University.  Research InterestsOperating Systems, Storage Systems, Cloud Computing, Machine Virtualization, Mobile SystemsExperienceAssociate Professor, Yonsei University, South Korea, Mar. 2023 ~ Present Associate Professor, Sungkyunkwan University, South Korea, Mar. 2020 ~ Feb. 2023Visiting Scholar, University of California, Irvine, CA, US, Aug. 2021 ~ Aug. 2022Assistant Professor, Sungkyunkwan University, South Korea, Mar. 2014 ~ Feb. 2020Postdoctoral Researcher, Sungkyunkwan University, South Korea, Mar 2013 ~ Feb. 2014PublicationsProfessional ActivitiesProgram committee: ISMM 2015, 2016, 2021, MSST 2020, 2021, FAST 2024, USENIX ATC 2024 (ERC), USENIX ATC 2025, MICRO 2025 (ERC)Organizing committee: APSys 2023, NVMSA 2024, NVRAMOS 2024 (program chair), SOSP 2025 (local chair), APSys 2025 (general chair)Reviewers: IEEE TC, TPDS, ACM TOS,  TWeb, JPDC, etc.Report abuseReport abuse
